title: Can You Be a Glow Worm? | Say No to the Need to Impress
description:
Ryan talks about how nothing will last forever, and reads this week’s meditation from The Daily Stoic Journal.

For a limited time, UCAN is offering you 30% off on your first order when you use code STOIC at checkout Just go to UCAN.CO/STOIC
